definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Do not wave on a boat, or you will fall into the water.
sentences.chinese: 行舟過渡時不要亂動，小心落水。

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年的另一個主要趨勢是向多核芯片的過渡。

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的過渡小組與每個區域辦事處舉辦了視頻會議。

sentences.english: So how can we not be concerned about the reserves during the transition period?
sentences.chinese: 過渡時期我們不過問儲備金行嗎？

sentences.english: No transition is ever smooth or easy.
sentences.chinese: 不曾有過平順或輕鬆的過渡。

sentences.english: Button on the side of the plane or edge for a smooth transition for the arc-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 按鈕的側面棱邊可爲平面或爲圓弧狀的平滑過渡。

sentences.english: But the events have not caught the team unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 不過此次事件並沒有超出過渡小組的預期。

sentences.english: Transition metal sulfur chemistry has an important significance in biochemistry and industry.
sentences.chinese: 過渡金屬硫化學在生物及工業方面均有重要意義。

sentences.english: But imagine the transition for a sadist.
sentences.chinese: 但是，請想像一個虐待狂的過渡。

sentences.english: Try to maintain Tadasana even during the transitions between asanas.
sentences.chinese: 即使在體式之間過渡時也試着保持山式。

sentences.english: Does tax preference transition period exist when foreign-funded enterprises deposit additional funds.
sentences.chinese: 外商投資企業追加投資是否存在稅收優惠過渡期？

sentences.english: The Jingpo ethnic minority is one of the eight "direct transition nationalities" in Yunnan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 景頗族是中國雲南省八個“直接過渡民族”之一。

sentences.english: This MODL represents a transitional arrangement for that caseload.
sentences.chinese: 這個MODL代表了這批個案的過渡安排。

sentences.english: This and only this will establish the basis for a transition to anything.
sentences.chinese: 唯有如此，才能爲建立任何的過渡方案打下基礎。

sentences.english: This transition from relief to reconstruction must take place smoothly, with sustained support.
sentences.chinese: 必須在持續的支持下，實現從救災向重建的平穩過渡。

sentences.english: Transitions or radii that are sharper than original design .
sentences.chinese: 比初始設計更尖銳的過渡段或倒角。

definition: to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
shift in the trend of events/turnaround/plot shift in a book/turn in the conversation
